virtual void ParameterGroup::prepareForSimulation (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Prepares this SimulationObject for simulation.

Should be called after creation and reset and before the simulation starts.

Implemented in TemplateParameterGroup< ENUM, SIZE >, TemplateParameterGroup< eInsurgentModelP, eNumInsurgentModelP >, TemplateParameterGroup< NOTYPE, 0 >, and TemplateParameterGroup< eFoodModelP, eNumFoodModelP >.
